TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceModelSectionGroup extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup

Docs.summary: Represents the main configuration section for [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks All [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] configuration elements are nested in the `system.serviceModel` element of the configuration file. [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] does not add elements to the configuration sections of other products.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the configuration section that contains child entries that are behavior elements.
Docs.value: The configuration section that contains child entries that are behavior elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `behavior` section defines behavior elements. Each entry is identified by its unique `name`, which is used by services when linking to behaviors.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section that contains all the bindings.
Docs.value: The configuration section that contains all the bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This section holds a collection of standard and custom bindings. Each entry is identified by its unique name, which is used by services when linking to bindings.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section that contains a list of endpoints that a client uses to connect to a service.
Docs.value: The configuration section that contains a list of endpoints that a client uses to connect to a service.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section that defines the namespace and contract name for a service contract used in COM+ interoperability.
Docs.value: The configuration section that defines the namespace and contract name for a service contract used in COM+ interoperability.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section that contains a list of behaviors that is applied to all [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services on the machine before the behaviors in the section are applied.
Docs.value: The configuration section that contains a list of behaviors that is applied to all [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services on the machine before the behaviors in the section are applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This section is defined in the Machine.config file. It contains a list of behaviors that is applied to all [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services on the machine before the behaviors in the behaviors collection are applied. If a behavior is defined in both sections, the behavior in the behaviors sections is given preference.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section for the diagnostics features of [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Docs.value: The configuration section for the diagnostics features of [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `diagnostics` section contains settings for the diagnostics features of [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. The user can enable/disable tracing, performance counters, and the WMI provider, and can add custom message filters.

Docs.summary: Gets a configuration section that defines all the extensions.
Docs.value: A configuration section that defines all the extensions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelSectionGroup GetSectionGroup(class System.Configuration.Configuration config) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents a configuration file.
Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section group from the specified configuration file.
Docs.returns: A that represents the settings in configuration.

Docs.summary: Gets an endpoint configuration section that defines the communications protocol.
Docs.value: An endpoint configuration section that defines the communications protocol.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section that defines what type the service hosting environment instantiates for a particular transport.
Docs.value: The configuration section that defines what type the service hosting environment instantiates for a particular transport.

Docs.summary: Gets the configuration section that defines a collection of services.
Docs.value: The configuration section that defines a collection of services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For each service defined in the assembly, this section contains a service element with the settings for the service.

Docs.summary: Gets a configuration section for the standard endpoints.
Docs.value: A standard endpoint section element object.
